\begin{verbatim}
x[0]:1;
x[1]:2;
for n:0 thru N do (
    x[n + 2]: 1/2*(x[n] + x[n+1])
);
\end{verbatim}}
\end{minipage}
%%% OUTPUT:
\begin{math}\displaystyle
\parbox{8ex}{\color{labelcolor}(\%o2) }

\end{math}

2
\end{math}

\begin{math}\displaystyle
\parbox{8ex}{\color{labelcolor}(\%o4) }
done
\end{math}
